full_text.full_text:
The Curse of Dimensionality (1/2)
▪ The phenomenon that data analysis becomes significantly harder 
as the dimensionality of the data increases
▪ Because, as dimensionality increases, the data becomes 
increasingly sparse in the space
– Also the distances between objects become very large
– Eventually the distances between objects become almost the same
1D (50% of data)
2D (25% of data)
3D (12.5% of data)
35
